name: CaveBoy
description: A small 3 month student project with a goal of creating a 3D Platformer in the style of Banjo Kazooie. The Premise is of a caveman who wakes up and finds his old home, and forest slowly being taken over by futuristic technology filled with creatures that anyone who grew up in a primitive world just cannot comprehend. And its up to the player to use the technology of a caveman to adapt and overcome the onslaught that is industrialization.
